patterns: What is the mission of IIT Jammu Tinkering Lab?
Tell me about the vision of IIT Jammu Tinkering Lab
What is the purpose of the Tinkering Lab?
Can you describe IIT Jammu Tinkering Lab's mission?
responses: IIT Jammu Tinkering Lab's mission is to create workspaces where young minds can learn innovation skills, sculpt their ideas through hands-on activities, social and cross-cultural collaboration, and ethical leadership. Students will learn to build models, enhance product development skills, and create innovative solutions to India's unique problems, promoting Atma Nirbhar Bharat.

patterns: What tools and resources are available at IIT Jammu Tinkering Lab?
Tell me about the tools and resources in the Tinkering Lab
How big is the IIT Jammu Tinkering Lab?
Where is the IIT Jammu Tinkering Lab located?
responses: The IIT Jammu Tinkering Lab is 1800 sq. ft. in size and located in the Institute's academic block. It is available 24/7 for students and faculty members and is just 170m away from the hostels.

patterns: Tell me about the new facility at IIT Jammu Tinkering Lab
What is the new facility in the Tinkering Lab?
Tell me about the new Institute Innovation & Entrepreneurship Development Center
responses: The new facility at IIT Jammu Tinkering Lab, which took 18 months to develop, spans an area of 8000 - 10000 sq. ft. and will serve as the Institute Innovation & Entrepreneurship Development Center.

patterns: Where is IIT Jammu Tinkering Lab located?
What is the address of IIT Jammu Tinkering Lab?
Tell me the contact details for IIT Jammu Tinkering Lab
responses: IIT Jammu Tinkering Lab is located at Indian Institute of Technology Jammu, Jagti, NH-44, PO Nagrota, Jammu - 181 221, J&K, India.
